projects.title: Budget Buddy
projects.bodyText:
- Budget Buddy is an expense management web app enabling users to do all the CRUD opertaions 
 -  Has an analytics section to see debited and credited payments.
 - User Privacy

projects.title: HomeGenie-Home Services
projects.bodyText:
- A Home service app for booking appointments for services like plumbing,cleaning,electrical work and painting
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **Descope**.

projects.title: PulsePro
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a fully functional fitness exercise app utilizing React,.
 - Empowered users to search for any exercise.
 - Displaying related exercises with animated GIFs and leveraged the power of Rapid API to seamlessly integrate YouTube videos for visual guidance and motivation.
